headline: Omnicom price target lowered to $99 from $110 at Wells Fargo
summary: Wells Fargo analyst Steven Cahall lowered the firm’s price target on Omnicom (OMC) to $99 from $110 and keeps an Equal Weight rating on the shares. The firm revises its Omnicom price target following the Interpublic Group (IPG) merger announcement. Its target is 10.5-times pro-forma EPS as investors wait through the deal approval and integration. Merged company top-line acceleration could potentially drive a future rerating, Wells adds. headline: Marketers Prepare to Navigate ‘Huge Distraction’ of Omnicom’s IPG Acquisition
summary: Omnicom Group says agency leaders will remain focused on clients during the acquisition and integration of Interpublic Group.
